title: Curation
text:
Masala Chai



drinks


autumn


winter



A warming spiced tea with equal amounts of (heady) caffeine and sugar. This adaptation tastes similar to the one served in Dishoom London: the best masala chai I’ve ever had.






Apr 21, 2024
